ingredients.ingredient: 1 ¼ cups baking mix (such as Bisquick ®)
1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Mix sausage and cream cheese until fully combined before adding dry ingredients
Chill mixture for easier handling when rolling into balls
These freeze well before baking for convenient make-ahead appetizers
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through combining ingredients and rolling uniform balls for even cooking.
